revised_title: Adrenal Cortex in Mice and its Relation to Gonads
tldr: The study investigates the adrenal cortex in mice and its relation to the gonads. It examines the changes in the adrenal cortex during the oestrous cycle, pregnancy, and after gonadectomy. The research confirms and supplements previous observations about the histological changes in the adrenal cortex and its connection to the reproductive system.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive Biology
